31 #include <termios.h>
32 #include <signal.h>
33 #include <math.h>
34 #include <stdio.h>
35 #include <stdlib.h>
36 #include <sys/poll.h>
37 
38 #include <boost/thread/thread.hpp>
39 #include <ros/ros.h>
40 #include <geometry_msgs/Twist.h>
41 
42 #define KEYCODE_I 0x69
43 #define KEYCODE_J 0x6a
44 #define KEYCODE_K 0x6b
45 #define KEYCODE_L 0x6c
46 #define KEYCODE_Q 0x71
47 #define KEYCODE_Z 0x7a
48 #define KEYCODE_W 0x77
49 #define KEYCODE_X 0x78
50 #define KEYCODE_E 0x65
51 #define KEYCODE_C 0x63
52 #define KEYCODE_U 0x75
53 #define KEYCODE_O 0x6F
54 #define KEYCODE_M 0x6d
55 #define KEYCODE_R 0x72
56 #define KEYCODE_V 0x76
57 #define KEYCODE_T 0x74
58 #define KEYCODE_B 0x62
59 
60 #define KEYCODE_COMMA 0x2c
61 #define KEYCODE_PERIOD 0x2e
62 
63 #define COMMAND_TIMEOUT_SEC 0.2
64 
65 // at full joystick depression you'll go this fast
66 double max_speed = 0.200; // m/second
67 double max_turn = 30.0*M_PI/180.0; // rad/second
68 // should we continuously send commands?
69 bool always_command = false;
70 
71 
72 class TBK_Node
73 {
74  private:
75  geometry_msgs::Twist cmdvel;
76  ros::NodeHandle n_;
77  ros::Publisher pub_;
78 
79  public:
80  TBK_Node()
81  {
82  pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel",1); //TBK_Node publishes RosAria/cmd_vel topic and RosAria node subscribes to it
83  }
84  ~TBK_Node() { }
85  void keyboardLoop();
86  void stopRobot()
87  {
88  cmdvel.linear.x = cmdvel.angular.z = 0.0;
89  pub_.publish(cmdvel);
90  }
91 };
92 
93 TBK_Node* tbk;
94 int kfd = 0;
95 struct termios cooked, raw;
96 bool done;
97 
98 int
99 main(int argc, char** argv)
100 {
101  ros::init(argc,argv,"tbk", ros::init_options::AnonymousName | ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
102  TBK_Node tbk;
103 
104  boost::thread t = boost::thread(boost::bind(&TBK_Node::keyboardLoop, &tbk));
105 
106  ros::spin();
107 
108  t.interrupt();
109  t.join();
110  tbk.stopRobot();
111  tcsetattr(kfd, TCSANOW, &cooked);
112 
113  return(0);
114 }
115 
116 void
117 TBK_Node::keyboardLoop()
118 {
119  char c;
120  double max_tv = max_speed;
121  double max_rv = max_turn;
122  bool dirty=false;
123 
124  int speed=0;
125  int turn=0;
126 
127  // get the console in raw mode
128  tcgetattr(kfd, &cooked);
129  memcpy(&raw, &cooked, sizeof(struct termios));
130  raw.c_lflag &=~ (ICANON | ECHO);
131  raw.c_cc[VEOL] = 1;
132  raw.c_cc[VEOF] = 2;
133  tcsetattr(kfd, TCSANOW, &raw);
134 
135  puts("Reading from keyboard");
136  puts("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
137  puts("q/z : increase/decrease max angular and linear speeds by 10%");
138  puts("w/x : increase/decrease max linear speed by 10%");
139  puts("e/c : increase/decrease max angular speed by 10%");
140  puts("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
141  puts("Moving around:");
142  puts(" u=turn left and go forward i=go forward o=turn right and go forward");
143  puts(" j=turn left k=stop l=turn right");
144  puts(" m=turn left and go backwards ,=go backwards .=turn right and go backwards");
145  puts(" anything else : stop");
146  puts("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
147 
148  struct pollfd ufd;
149  ufd.fd = kfd;
150  ufd.events = POLLIN;
151  for(;;)
152  {
153  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
154 
155  // get the next event from the keyboard
156  int num;
157  if((num = poll(&ufd, 1, 250)) < 0)
158  {
159  perror("poll():");
160  return;
161  }
162  else if(num > 0)
163  {
164  if(read(kfd, &c, 1) < 0)
165  {
166  perror("read():");
167  return;
168  }
169  }
170  else
171  continue;
172 
173  switch(c)
174  {
175  case KEYCODE_I:
176  speed = 1;
177  turn = 0;
178  dirty = true;
179  break;
180  case KEYCODE_K:
181  speed = 0;
182  turn = 0;
183  dirty = true;
184  break;
185  case KEYCODE_O:
186  speed = 1;
187  turn = -1;
188  dirty = true;
189  break;
190  case KEYCODE_J:
191  speed = 0;
192  turn = 1;
193  dirty = true;
194 // printf("Pressed J!\n");
195  break;
196  case KEYCODE_L:
197  speed = 0;
198  turn = -1;
199  dirty = true;
200  break;
201  case KEYCODE_U:
202  turn = 1;
203  speed = 1;
204  dirty = true;
205  break;
206  case KEYCODE_COMMA:
207  turn = 0;
208  speed = -1;
209  dirty = true;
210  break;
211  case KEYCODE_PERIOD:
212  turn = 1;
213  speed = -1;
214  dirty = true;
215  break;
216  case KEYCODE_M:
217  turn = -1;
218  speed = -1;
219  dirty = true;
220  break;
221  case KEYCODE_Q:
222  max_tv += max_tv / 10.0;
223  max_rv += max_rv / 10.0;
224  if(always_command)
225  dirty = true;
226  break;
227  case KEYCODE_Z:
228  max_tv -= max_tv / 10.0;
229  max_rv -= max_rv / 10.0;
230  if(always_command)
231  dirty = true;
232  break;
233  case KEYCODE_W:
234  max_tv += max_tv / 10.0;
235  if(always_command)
236  dirty = true;
237  break;
238  case KEYCODE_X:
239  max_tv -= max_tv / 10.0;
240  if(always_command)
241  dirty = true;
242  break;
243  case KEYCODE_E:
244  max_rv += max_rv / 10.0;
245  if(always_command)
246  dirty = true;
247  break;
248  case KEYCODE_C:
249  max_rv -= max_rv / 10.0;
250  if(always_command)
251  dirty = true;
252  break;
253  default:
254  speed = 0;
255  turn = 0;
256  dirty = true;
257  }
258  if (dirty == true)
259  {
260  cmdvel.linear.x = speed * max_tv;
261  cmdvel.angular.z = turn * max_rv;
262 // printf("sending...[%f, %f]\n", cmdvel.linear.x, cmdvel.angular.z);
263  pub_.publish(cmdvel);
264  }
265  }
266 }
